house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1996 has 3 bedroom(s), 3 bath(s) , 3 car garage. Rooms include dining room, master bedroom. Features include view, private pool, private spa, patio, fireplace, air conditioning, skylights.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Bar, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Ceiling Fan(s), CentralVacuum, Contemporary Style, Dishwasher, Gazebo, Great Room, IntercomSystem, Microwave, Pantry, Skylights, Tennis Court(s), Trash Compacter
